name: genie2bsml
description: convert genie GFF output to BSML

options.description: Input file file from a genie scan.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
If passed, will create a Seq-data-import element referencing this path.
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids. Defaults to 'unknown' if not passed.
Output BSML file (will be created, must not exist)
